hackathon-description-text: HackMizzou is a weekend long college hackathon hosted every year at the University of Missouri, Columbia. A hackathon is an event where developers and designers collaborate in teams to build mobile apps and websites. At the end of the weekend, applicants submit their creations and judges award prizes based on innovation, use of certain technologies, and many other criteria. Food and sleeping places are provided - although applicants are encouraged to stay up hacking.

hackathon-prizes.prize-title: Domain.com - Best Domain Name from Domain.com

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: Watch Dogs 2 Collector’s Edition for each member of the team.
hackathon-prizes.prize-title: Ubisoft - Watch Dogs® 2 Best Device Privacy Hack

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: - Use your tech skills for good and hack online harassment.
hackathon-prizes.prize-title: Hack Harassment - Best Hack Against Online Harassment

hackathon-location-google-maps: https://maps.google.com/?q=2301 Maguire Blvd, Columbia, MO 65201, USA
hackathon-description-header: 24 hour hackathon where developers and designers collaborate in teams to build apps and websites.
